title: Translate into a System of Equations
text: The sum of the two numbers is 65: $$n+m=65$$.

title: Solve the System of Equations

title: Solve for $$n$$
text: $$m$$ will be eliminated and then solve for $$n$$.\n$$2n=90$$\n$$n=45$$

title: Substitute and Solve for $$m$$
text:
Substitute $$n=45$$ into one of the original equations and solve for $$m$$.
$$n+m=65$$
$$45+m=65$$
$$m=20$$
